title: Final Justice
description: A ruthless killer returns--and former DI Lorne Simpkins is forced to revisit her ugly past.After suffering a breakdown and quitting the force, Lorne Simpkinsfinds herself embroiled in an MI6 covert operation to hunt down her old enemy, a sadistic and merciless criminal whose ambition is to become the world's richest man.Lorne tracks the madman through France, attempting to thwart his plans and bring her long-time nemesis to Final Justice.
author: M.A. Comley
